title: Live: Reaction to sacking of Premier League-winning Ranieri - BBC News
summary: foxes sack title winning manager ranieri .
it was a 'most difficult decision , ' owners claim .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 tuesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return on monday 08:00 .

documents.title: watch : 'i feel like the candle 's gone out '
text: the bbc sport cameras have been down at the king power stadium getting reaction from fans to the sacking
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: has football lost its soul ?
text: bt sport commentator ian darke raises an interesting question
do n't know what 's worse .
ranieri ' s sacking or those shrugging their shoulders and saying : `` that 's football '' .
is it now that soulless ?
sorry mr. darke i live in a country who puts a white supremacist in the white house as chief of staff , plenty of soulless all over
i 'd be interested to hear your thoughts if you were a leicester fan and had watched us recently , ian
i do hope leicester get relegated now
well , it 's not like ranieri wo n't get another job , and it 's not like @ twitterid are going to get a better manager .
do n't know why people keep saying its business .
successful businesses do n't keep making knee jerk decisions .
i ca n't imagine a top-tier sports franchise in any sport in the world that would n't have fired ranieri .
@ twitterid yes
leicester got it all wrong at the start of the season , sold kante , and concentrated on champions league directors decisions
totally classless by leicester city & king power
this news has really hit u hard !
yes it is .
one of the worst cliches about , the old 'that 's football ' .
football lost its soul the day they decided to reward 20th position in epl with 120mil and fa cup winners get zilch
completely agree .
glad someone said it .
the whole thing is shameful .
that ca n't possibly be what the @ twitterid league has become
i do n't care how bad they 've played , i think ranieri has earned another year because of the way they played last year
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : five things we 'll miss about claudio
text: from his jovial press conferences to his famous `` dilly ding , dilly dong '' catchphrase , bbc sport looks back at what we 'll miss from claudio ranieri after he was sacked as leicester manager
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: listen : 'crazy ' sacking gives players 'a clean slate '
text: here is what former leicester player joey gudjonsson thinks of the decision to sack claudio ranieri and the possible involvement of the players in all of this
author: BBC World Service

documents.title: shakespeare : we 'll need fans support
text: leicester caretaker boss craig shakespeare also used his press conference to issue a rallying cry to supporters .
churchillian it was n't but here is what he said
`` i ca n't tell the fans how to behave , '' shakespeare told reporters at the king power stadium .
`` what i will say is we 'll need their support over the next few matches , starting with liverpool on monday . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ranieri thanks club and fans
text: there 's more from the man himself including his `` heartfelt thanks '' to everybody at the club but `` mostly the supporters '' .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: ranieri will 'always love ' leicester city
text: yesterday my dream died .
after the euphoria of last season and being crowned premier league champions all i dreamt of was staying with leicester city , the club i love , for always .
sadly this was not to be . ''
author: Press Association

documents.title: breakingranieri 's 'dream died ' when sacked
text: claudio ranieri has said `` yesterday my dream died '' following his sacking by leicester , in a statement released to press association sport .
author: Press Association

documents.title: jon rudkin 'central in appointing new manager '
text: the times ' chief football writer henry winter tweets
jon rudkin , influential director of football at # lcfc , and courtier-in-chief to the thai owners , central to managerial recruitment process .
and player recruitment which has been poor , leaving it til deadline day to get a third choice cb should 've took the bullet too .
not renegotiating steve walsh 's contract was crazy .
club miss him .
he signed a new deal and left , henry ?
indeed .
looking back you have to wonder whether he realised in preseason that things were n't quite right .
he should n't be in a job henry , bloke is awful at what he does , we 'll be in a mess for as long as he 's dof .
leicester miss steve walsh , tom , not just for the recruitment but as a voice of calm and reason .
@ twitterid @ twitterid what you mean steve walsh the raving homo ?
not that i have a problem like .
unless he got a wife
the wrong steve walsh shane mate
walsh 's
i think some # lcfc fans need to be reminded of what a fantastic job rudkin did running our successful academy for many years
when has the academy been 'successful ' ?
produced andy king , schlupp , chilwell , moore and others .
the club 's academy has punched above its weight against bigger clubs
but he 's bloody useless ? ! ? ! ?
@ twitterid # rudkinout # comebackclaudio
he 's done a terrible job this year with player recruitment .
please find out what hold rudkin has over the owners - he should follow claudio out the door
@ twitterid oh no
basically rudkin sucks the thais dicks
it would be great if you could do some kind of article with rudkin as the majority of # lcfc fans are baffled by what he does
please
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ranieri 'still in demand '
text: sport editor dan roan tweets
at least there 's some loyalty in leicester claudio ranieri - sacked but still in demand here this afternoon
why do the media have to shove a camera in the blokes face tho give him respect
he 's welcome round for a cuppa or a glass of wine anytime .
ciao claudio !
@ twitterid liquidate leicester .
@ twitterid did i hear smile dobby though ?
this contradicts reports that ranieri flew to rome last night after his sacking .
this man is a class act !
he is not hiding from the people that supported him .
but i bet the thai owners are .
nothing to be upset with ranieri about , clearly the players should be asked a few questions though
he seems like such a lovely man .
i think we 're going to miss him .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bruce : i 'm scratching my head at ranieri dismissal
text: steve bruce , who is in charge of aston villa , is the latest manager to slam claudio ranieri 's sacking .
`` we understand as managers now that we are the whipping boys , '' the former birmingham and hull boss said .
`` i 'm scratching my head , like everyone else is , asking myself how someone who delivered the finest achievement in football last year could now be sacked . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ranieri 'remains a hero '
text: itv midlands reporter ben chapman tweets
claudio # ranieri still a hero to young leicester fans despite being sacked , posing for as they deliver a card .
@ twitterid
nice house
you can only see the door .
nice door
does his doorbell go dilly ding dilly dong ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid a class act from a very classy man
@ twitterid @ twitterid this man is class
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid classy classy man
@ twitterid @ twitterid gentleman .
@ twitterid @ twitterid class act # ranieri
@ twitterid @ twitterid making this sound like an unemployed coal miner rather than a multi-millionaire ex football manager .
that seems really wierd .
like it was set up ?
disgusting how he has been treated
i bet that card was used to light his log fire what a village freak # lockyourdoor # villagestalker
@ twitterid @ twitterid hero yes but a villain too never forget his horrendous decisions monaco cl semi finals enter mr jose
hi , is it possible for us to use this in our player with a link to your page and an on screen credit to you and itv ?
thanks
poorman
author: ITV

documents.title: your comments : were the players to blame ?
text: there are still plenty of comments coming into the bbc leicester facebook page reflecting on last night 's sacking and whether the players are to blame .
gillian morris .
writes : `` regardless of what shakespeare says , or rather didn´t say , some of the playing squad need to take a long hard look at themselves .
`` they should take some responsibilty for the position that leicester find themselves in and should hang their heads in shame for their effort and attitude so far this season . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: jones : the papers always want a scapegoat
text: switching sports again temporarily , here is a little bit more from england rugby head coach eddie jones ( see 14:57 ) about the demise of claudio ranieri .
`` i must admit i felt a bit sick hearing the news because he 's such a great , honourable guy and he 's done a fantastic job .

`` the papers want to blame the players for his demise , the papers always want to have a scapegoat , but the reality is when you 're successful it 's a combination of players and staff working together , and when you 're unsuccessful it 's a combination of players and staff too . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : shakespeare faces the media
text: cars , claudio and trips to los angeles - here are the highlights of craig shakespeare 's first press conference as caretaker manager of leicester
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: lawro predicts : leicester 0 liverpool 2
text: i made my original prediction for this game before ranieri 's exit and , although i have not changed the score , the situation makes it more difficult for liverpool .
there is no doubt there will be more of a unified effort from the leicester team , whether their new manager is in place or not .
it always happens .
i still think liverpool will win , if they play like they did against tottenham .
it suits the reds when they press teams all over the pitch , and that is definitely the way forward for them .
author: Mark Lawrenson
Former Liverpool defender

documents.title: preview of foxes-reds coming up
text: amid all the drama of the last 12 hours there is of course a game with liverpool on monday evening - we 'll look ahead to that with mark lawrenson momentarily
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: jones : i have sympathy for ranieri
text: england rugby union head coach eddie jones has added his name to the list of people who have come out in support of sacked leicester boss claudio ranieri .
he said : `` leicester city is an amazing story , i feel a lot of sympathy for ranieri . ''
`` you can understand why us coaches are looking over our shoulders . ''
author: BBC Radio 5 live

documents.title: mourinho wears t-shirt in support of ranieri
text: sky sports news reporter fraser dainton tweets
mourinho 's shirt support for claudio ranieri .
`` they should name the leicester stadium after him . ''
how does this even concern him ?
dunno , do they have similar professions or something ?
you 're right .
i about when forgot cr wore a mourinho top hat after chelsea sacked him .
i know , & i forgot how chelsea won the league from being genuine relegation candidates with little to no budget
he 's not dead .
there 's no need to name stadiums or wear tribute polo tops .
initials on your top & suggesting the club name a stadium after the guy isnt the most outlandish thing i 'll read today
fair point but we 'll have to agree to disagree .
i felt just to comment on it would have been enough .
bit too showy .
and when mgrs rarely get any support from media , board ( or even players ) , its gd to see some solidarity from fellow mgrs
# mufc # lcfc mourinho d man the way you supported cl and stand up to say it loud !
may it 's time to back to mu
@ twitterid ridiculous .
are all clubs now wearing black armbands at the weekend ?
lol but he 's not lying
he should know all about what he is going through after last season
@ twitterid hypocrite !
said some of the nastiest things about ranieri while both were in series a !
is he dead ?
that 's too much .
did he support cr when he signed for # cfc before cr had left ?
@ twitterid the players should take responsibility
@ twitterid drama queen mourinho
author: Sky Sports

documents.title: ranieri 's been 'stabbed in the back '
text: we 've just had this email in from alastair and he 's certainly not holding back
the leicester city owners have n't just stabbed ranieri in the back ; they 've done it to the entire city of leicester , myself included .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: first of ranieri appear following sacking
text: sky sports news reporter rob dorsett tweets
exclusive : claudio ranieri leaving # lcfc training ground this afternoon after packing his car with his belongings .
# ssnhq
after all that happened claudio still smiling great man he will be missed here
i miss him already
@ twitterid least he got a new bmw i8 to put his stuff in .
@ twitterid call me a sadist , but this was looooonggg overdue dec was the best tym
yep but worst timing possible
see every wk , the sack keeps being vindicated ranieli lost focus
# kingclaudio thanks for the memories
leave him some dignity ffs , do you take snaps at funerals too ?
grazie claudio
@ twitterid relegation here we go
trouble is he always papering over the cracks and laughed off the problems !
@ twitterid he has bn treat shocking
@ twitterid lmaooo
@ twitterid he packed the pl trophy in there ?
author: Sky Sports

documents.title: mourinho : leicester should name stadium after ranieri
text: manchester united boss jose mourinho has been speaking about claudio ranieri 's dismissal .
`` he deserves the leicester stadium to be named claudio ranieri stadium , '' mourinho said .
`` the most beautiful thing in the premier league and one of most beautiful in football history .
`` it 's very difficult to accept . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: shakespeare 'looked like he 'd been a manager for years '
text: craig shakespeare take a bow , he was the consummate professional with the media .
he dealt with the press conference as though he 'd been a premier league manager for years .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: reaction to craig shakespeare 's press conference
text: leicester 's ian stringer and jason bourne are live outside the king power stadium following craig shakespeare 's first press conference as caretaker boss
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: shakespeare and ranieri had 'long and private ' conversation
text: there was also a question from the press about how shakespeare viewed his former boss claudio ranieri .
`` there 's a lot speculation with no foundation about my relationship with claudio , '' he said .
`` it has been perfectly fine .
i spoke to him on the phone and he thanked me for the support .
`` it was not brief and we exchanged views .
a lot of what we said will stay private . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: shakespeare 'unfazed ' by managerial role
text: shakespeare also touched upon how suitable he thinks he is for the top job at leicester .
he said : `` i always feel sorry when people lose their jobs .
i 'm not aware of the club having spoken to any candidates .
`` do i think i can do the job ?
yes .
does it phase me ?
no . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: shakespeare handled media 'superbly '
text: leicester mercury sports writer james sharpe tweets
craig shakespeare bombarded with questions about ranieri 's sacking at # lcfc .
he 's handled them superbly : calm , composed , and frank .
if there is anyone who can unite the # lcfc dressing room , it 's shakespeare .
hugely popular among the players , and extremely good coach .
@ thesharpeend shakespeare ; a true wordsmith !
and with so much treachery and tragedy running amock .
to be or not to be a happy ending ?
# lcfc
thought he did brilliantly
@ twitterid i thought he looked like someone who 's been rumbled & seemed very uncomfortable in my opinion
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: players 'hurt and frustrated '
text: shakespeare has added the squad were behind ranieri .
`` the players are hurt and frustrated , '' he said .
`` i 've not had one problem with them . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: my opinion on sacking 'irrelevant , ' shakespeare says
text: assistant manager craig shakespeare is talking to reporters at the king power stadium about the sacking of ranieri .
`` i think whether i think it 's the right decision is irrelevant .
we all know results have n't been good enough . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: shakespeare : my job is to get players focused
text: here 's our first snippet from craig shakespeare
cs : my job is to get the players ready and focused on liverpool .
we need to get back to winning ways and get three points . ''
# leiliv
cs : we 've 13 games left and that starts monday .
the fans have always been magnificent .
we need to be together and behind the team . ''
# leiliv
cs : confidence can go very quickly but it can come back very quickly .
my aim is to restore that confidence quickly . ''
# leiliv
cs : i 'm totally convinced that we have enough talent in that dressing room .
come monday , we 'll be ready . ''
# leiliv
cs : i 've been a caretaker before .
i 've never been in a press conference quite as big as this !
but i 'm ready for the challenge . ''
# leiliv
enjoy your degradation zone.no respect for this team
any body think hodgson for leicester ? ?
oh please no ! !
van gaal
thought he 'd retired
no what about pearson again it 's his team that won the premier league
agreed but backward step i think , the club and team should 've moved on
frank de boer would be great
good choice.whoever it is needs to be prepared to work in championship .
would big names do that ?
waste of money if not
this wreaks of blackburn and kean a few years ago .
i hope liverpool spank you 3-0 .
only 3-0 , i thought you # lcfc haters would have wanted more ?
you 're playing liverpool not united .
jesus , i had to keep it realistic ; )
wonder how he feels to manage a load of snakes who are only in the position they are because they have been shite
the could not do it for ranieri why do it for you and not their fans
the club should be ashamed of themselves !
hope you never win again after the appalling treatment of ranieri ! !
that 's one achievement lcfc will never see again !
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : ranieri 's favourite ice cream 'retired immediately '
text: radio leicester has been speaking to gelato village , an ice cream shop in leicester , about their decision to retire claudio ranieri 's favourite flavour in his honour
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: klopp : add sacking to the recent 'strange ' events
text: liverpool manager jurgen klopp , who brings his liverpool side to king power stadium on monday , has said he is n't surprised by claudio ranieri 's sacking .
`` am i surprised that things like this can happen ?
no , '' klopp said .
`` there have been a few strange decisions in 16/17 - brexit , trump and ranieri . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: lineker : ranieri was 'genuine and warm '
text: we 've heard a lot from leicester city fan gary lineker already , but earlier this afternoon he spoke to bbc news .
he said claudio ranieri was `` just genuine , he was just warm '' and `` the whole country warmed to him '' .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: caretaker manager arrives to face media
text: here comes craig shakespeare
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: ranieri 's legend lives on
text: these `` claudioccino '' coffees are selling fast in the city centre .
author: Amy Harris
BBC East Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: live page host handover
text: after a chicken sandwich and a cup of orange squash - i 'm back with you .
thank you to sandish shoker for looking after things .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: media awaiting craig shakespeare
text: it 's a big turn out for leicester caretaker manager craig shakespeare 's pre-match press conference today .
tough for him to answer any questions regarding ranieri 's dismissal but they 're clearly going to be asked .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: press awaits shakespeare
text: craig shakespeare is due to speak at the club 's pre-liverpool press conference shortly .
we 'll bring you the updates as we get them .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: arrivederci ranieri !
text: sports editor dan roan reports that claudio ranieri has flown back to italy 's capital rome today .
author: BBC Sport
